meanings.definition: Windsurfs (verb): to engage in the sport of windsurfing
meanings.sent1: He windsurfs on the lake every weekend.
meanings.sent2: She loves to windsurfs whenever there is a strong breeze.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks it windsurfs when chasing leaves in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His imagination windsurfs through the clouds as he daydreams.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sail as he windsurfs makes the lake look magical.

meanings.definition: Windsurfs (noun): a person who participates in windsurfing
meanings.sent1: The windsurfs at the beach are always so skilled.
meanings.sent2: She met a group of windsurfs who shared their experiences with her.
meanings.sent3: The windsurfs gathered for a friendly competition by the shore.
meanings.sent4: Among the windsurfs, he stood out with his unique board design.
meanings.sent5: The windsurfs' laughter echoed over the waves as they enjoyed the day.
